column4: Hello everyone, this is day two after updating from 9.04 to 9.10...  I still haven't gotten pwmconfig/fancontrol to work as before.  I've been to a few fancontrol pages, but I don't see any clear answers because there are rumors it could kill my pc if I don't do this right.
to message the bot with it NOT showing up in the channel use "/msg ubottu !pwmconfig"
